main event: A bright, glowing object was observed moving from east to west over Uruguay for 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object changed from a white glow to a reddish color while maintaining a constant appearance.
The object was round in shape.
The witness was familiar with conventional aircraft and believed the sighting was a real phenomenon of an unknown nature.
Similar sightings were reported in the area around the same time.
The object disappeared after 15 minutes of observation.
